data.question: What is the highest ammonia uptake reported among the MFM-300 materials at 273 K and 1 bar?
Which MFM-300 material undergoes a host-guest charge transfer leading to the oxidation of adsorbed NH3 to hydrazine?
How many cycles of adsorption/desorption under dry conditions do MFM-300(M) materials (M = Cr, Fe, V(III), V(IV)) show excellent reversible uptake capacity for NH3?
What technique is used to study the binding interaction and structure dynamics of NH3 adsorption in MFM-300 materials?
Which MFM-300 material shows the highest stability against humid NH3?
What method is used to confirm the formation of N2H4 upon NH3 adsorption in MFM-300(VIV)?
What is the effect of NH3 adsorption on the oxidation state of the V center in MFM-300(VIV)?
data.answer: The oxidation state of the V center decreases, suggesting the reduction of V(IV) to V(III) centers in MFM-300(VIV).

data.question: True or False: MFM-300 materials are capable of reversible NH3 adsorption.
True or False: All MFM-300 materials show the same level of stability under humid conditions.
True or False: The adsorption of NH3 in MFM-300 materials does not lead to any structural degradation.
True or False: The INS technique is sensitive to the vibrations of hydrogen atoms.
True or False: MFM-300(VIV) shows a decrease in NH3 uptake after several cycles of adsorption and desorption.
True or False: The Watt and Chrisp method can differentiate N2H4 from NH3.
True or False: The bond valence model (BVM) is used to calculate the oxidation state of metal centers in MFM-300 materials.
True or False: MFM-300 materials do not show any change in their structure upon NH3 adsorption.
True or False: MFM-300(VIV) can be regenerated to its original state after NH3 adsorption.
True or False: The INS technique cannot measure bulk properties of materials.
True or False: MFM-300 materials are not sensitive to the presence of water vapor.
True or False: MFM-300 materials show a decrease in NH3 uptake capacity over repeated cycles.
True or False: The oxidation state of the V center in MFM-300(VIV) increases upon NH3 adsorption.
